synopsis: Another special to accompany the release of the 14th feature film, The Lost Ship in the Sky. Along with a number of previous episodes, the original episode contained within will take place after the events of the film.
title: Detective Conan Magic File 4: Osaka Okonomiyaki Odyssey
title_jp: 名探偵コナンMAGIC FILE 4 ～大阪お好み焼きオデッセイ～
